attributes.action: encourage all members of the voting public not to vote in any further elections to ensure that our greedy, arrogant, self-serving politicians are forever removed from positions of power and potential abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who reads this petition should sign this petition and "go on voter strike".  They should refrain from voting in any elections, local, national and european, for a period not less than three years.  This will then send a clear message that the political parties in the UK need to re-evaluate their positions regarding the power they wield and treat with far more respect the mandate they receive from the electorate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
